Class models.TextBoxModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • models.TextBoxModel

  • public class models.TextBoxModel
extends java.util.Observable
    Manages words in a typing test.

    • Field Summary

      static int CLEAR_EVENT 
      static int MOVE_ROWS_UPWARDS_EVENT

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      models.TextBoxModel()
      Creates a models.TextBoxModel with default values based on models.SettingsModel.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears the current words.
      void formRows(int maxWidth, int additionalWidth, javax.swing.JLabel referenceLabel)
      Forms rows of the current words based on the maximum width of a row to ensure that every row does not have words that will be out of bounds of the GUI.
      int getColumnCount(int rowIndex)
      Returns the number of columns at a given row.

      Returns the current column.

      Returns the words at a given row.

      Returns the number of rows this object has.
      int getRowIndex()
      Returns the current row.
      boolean goToNextWord()
      Increases the columnIndex by 1.
      void markCurrentWordAsCorrect()
      Sets background to a white color and the foreground to a green color of the word at the current row and column of this object.
      void markCurrentWordAsCurrentlyCorrect()
      Sets the background of the word at the current row and column of this object to a gray color.
      void markCurrentWordAsCurrentlyWrong()
      Sets the background of the word at the current row and column of this object to a red color.
      void markCurrentWordAsWrong()
      Sets background to a white color and the foreground to a red color of the word at the current row and column of this object.
      void moveRowsUp()
      Notifies the observers that the rows needs to be moved upwards on the text box.
      boolean needsToMoveRowsUp()
      Returns true if the current rowIndex is greater than zero and the columnIndex is equal to zero, false otherwise.
      void reset()
      Resets the TextBox with new words.
      void setColumnIndex(int columnIndex)
      Sets the current column.
      void setRowIndex(int rowIndex)

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the TextBox with new words.

      • formRows

        public void formRows(int maxWidth,
                     int additionalWidth,
                     javax.swing.JLabel referenceLabel)
        Forms rows of the current words based on the maximum width of a row to ensure that every row does not have words that will be out of bounds of the GUI.
        Parameters:
        maxWidth - the maximum width of a row
        additionalWidth - the additional width of a word
        referenceLabel - a reference label to get the preferred width of a word

      • getRowCount

        public int getRowCount()
        Returns the number of rows this object has.
        Returns:
        the number of rows this object has

      • getColumnCount

        public int getColumnCount(int rowIndex)
        Returns the number of columns at a given row.
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - the row to check
        Returns:
        the number of columns at a given row

      • markCurrentWordAsCurrentlyCorrect

        public void markCurrentWordAsCurrentlyCorrect()
        Sets the background of the word at the current row and column of this object to a gray color.

      • markCurrentWordAsCurrentlyWrong

        public void markCurrentWordAsCurrentlyWrong()
        Sets the background of the word at the current row and column of this object to a red color.

      • markCurrentWordAsWrong

        public void markCurrentWordAsWrong()
        Sets background to a white color and the foreground to a red color of the word at the current row and column of this object.

      • markCurrentWordAsCorrect

        public void markCurrentWordAsCorrect()
        Sets background to a white color and the foreground to a green color of the word at the current row and column of this object.

      • goToNextWord

        public boolean goToNextWord()
        Increases the columnIndex by 1. If the columnIndex becomes equal to the current column size then it columnIndex will become zero and rowIndex will increase by 1. Returns true if it successfully went to the next word, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if it successfully went to the next word, false otherwise

      • needsToMoveRowsUp

        public boolean needsToMoveRowsUp()
        Returns true if the current rowIndex is greater than zero and the columnIndex is equal to zero, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if the current rowIndex is greater than zero and the columnIndex is equal to zero, false otherwise

      • moveRowsUp

        public void moveRowsUp()
        Notifies the observers that the rows needs to be moved upwards on the text box.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the current words.
